name: steamding
description: Until now, unlocking an achievement at Steam was a pretty bland experience compared to the **satisfactory sound effects** our console counterparts provide.   Recall the swift xylophonic sound of the PlayStation trophy or the minimalistic faucet-leaking two notes of the 360.   This tool fills that void by **playing a sound** of your choice whenever you achieve that unachievable achievement.
author: Miguel Mano
